title: File:00 2477 Cape Horn - Chile.jpg
author: W. Bulach
description: Cape Horn, the headland on the Chilean rocky island of Isla Hornos at 55o58` south and 67o16` west, is the southernmost point of South America. The Antarctic is around 800 kilometers away from the 450 meter high landmark. The circumnavigation of the cape is one of the most feared ship passages.
